text: LaunchPad Central uses cookies to help LaunchPad Central identify and track visitors, their usage of the Website, and their Website access preferences.

For example, we ask visitors who sign up for LaunchPad Central services to provide a username and email address.
If we ever send you information by email concerning new products, services or information that you did not expressly request, we will provide you with an email address by which you may request no further notices.

Clients have complete access to all information entered by users created under a Client account; Launch Pad Central has no obligation to maintain any information entered by a user as private or confidential as between the user and the Client.

Clients who sign up for LaunchPad Central's services are asked to provide additional information, including as necessary the personal and financial information required to create accounts and process payments.
In each case, LaunchPad Central collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor's interaction with LaunchPad Central.

data_type: statistic about behavior of visitor to website
text: LaunchPad Central may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to the Website.
Upon your request, we will provide you with a summary of the information we collect about you.
For example, we ask visitors who sign up for LaunchPad Central services to provide a username and email address.

This Privacy Policy describes how LaunchPad Central, Inc. ("LaunchPad Central") treats the information we collect when you visit and use the websites available at www.glidr.com and other related websites with links to this Privacy Policy (collectively, the "Website").
